name: Russia 2055
storyline: Russia 2055 is described as a prologue to a game called Battle A.E. (Battle After Earth), featuring visuals that impressed all gamers when it was initially unveiled.
summary: In year 2055 US Forces and Russian Military conflict halts as they defend earth from the first alien invasion that first started in Russia. Players will be able to take the role as regular foot infantry, pilot Russian bipedal AA Mechs, or partake in aerial combat on a 64 Multiplayer server.
